name: Summer ☀️
tips: Water plants early morning or late evening.
Avoid direct sunlight for sensitive plants.

name: Rainy 🌧️
tips: Ensure proper drainage to avoid root rot.

name: Winter ❄️
tips: Reduce watering as soil dries slower.
Keep plants away from cold drafts.

name: Autumn 🍂
tips: Repot if needed to refresh soil.
